title: Chelsea Close In On Koulibaly
description:
The FC crew break down Kalidou Koulibaly's impending move to Chelsea and argue if the Senegal star defender can help fill the void left by other departures this summer. Plus, Alessandro Del Piero joins the show to discuss Paul Pogba taking over his No. 10 jersey at Juventus, Antonio Conte's training sessions and Matthijs de Ligt's future with the Italian club.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Chelsea close in on Koulibaly deal; PSG turn down chance to sign Ronaldo; Alessandro Del Piero on Pogba Taking Juve's No. 10
